001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums.WebElementAction;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.FourFunction;
006import java.util.Collections;
007import java.util.Map;
008import lombok.Getter;
009import org.openqa.selenium.ElementClickInterceptedException;
010import org.openqa.selenium.ElementNotInteractableException;
011import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException;
012import org.openqa.selenium.StaleElementReferenceException;
013import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
014
015/**
016 * Enum that defines exception handling strategies for WebElement actions.
017 *
018 * <p>Each entry in this enum represents a specific WebElement action
019 * and maps known exceptions to their respective handling functions.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023public enum ExceptionHandlingWebElement {
024
025   /**
026    * Handles exceptions for the findElement action.
027    */
028   FIND_ELEMENT("findElement",
029         Map.of(
030               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
031                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
032                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENT, objects[0]),
033               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
034                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
035                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENT, objects[0])
036         )),
037
038   /**
039    * Handles exceptions for the findElements action.
040    */
041   FIND_ELEMENTS("findElements",
042         Map.of(
043               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
044                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
045                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS, objects[0]),
046               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
047                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
048                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS, objects[0])
049         )),
050
051   /**
052    * Handles exceptions for the click action.
053    */
054   CLICK("click",
055         Map.of(
056               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
057                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
058                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLICK),
059               ElementClickInterceptedException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
060                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementClickIntercepted(
061                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLICK, exception),
062               ElementNotInteractableException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
063                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementNotInteractable(
064                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLICK),
065               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
066                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
067                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLICK, objects[0])
068         )),
069
070   /**
071    * Handles exceptions for the sendKeys action.
072    */
073   SEND_KEYS("sendKeys",
074         Map.of(
075               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
076                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
077                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SEND_KEYS, objects[0]),
078               ElementClickInterceptedException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
079                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementClickIntercepted(
080                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SEND_KEYS, exception, objects[0]),
081               ElementNotInteractableException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
082                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementNotInteractable(
083                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SEND_KEYS, objects[0]),
084               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
085                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
086                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SEND_KEYS, objects[0])
087         )),
088
089   /**
090    * Handles exceptions for the submit action.
091    */
092   SUBMIT("submit",
093         Map.of(
094               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
095                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
096                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SUBMIT),
097               ElementNotInteractableException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
098                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementNotInteractable(
099                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SUBMIT),
100               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
101                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
102                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.SUBMIT, objects[0])
103         )),
104
105   /**
106    * Handles exceptions for the clear action.
107    */
108   CLEAR("clear",
109         Map.of(
110               StaleElementReferenceException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
111                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleStaleElement(
112                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLEAR),
113               ElementNotInteractableException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
114                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleElementNotInteractable(
115                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLEAR),
116               NoSuchElementException.class, (driver, smartWebElement, exception, objects) ->
117                     ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(
118                           driver, smartWebElement, WebElementAction.CLICK, objects[0])
119         ));
120
121   /**
122    * The name of the method being handled.
123    */
124   @Getter
125   private final String methodName;
126
127   /**
128    * A map associating exception types with their handling functions.
129    */
130   private final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourFunction<WebDriver,
131         SmartWebElement, Object[], Exception, Object>> exceptionHandlingMap;
132
133   /**
134    * Constructs an instance of {@code ExceptionHandlingWebElement} with the specified method name and exception
135    * handling map.
136    *
137    * @param methodName           The name of the WebElement method.
138    * @param exceptionHandlingMap The mapping of exception types to handling functions.
139    */
140   ExceptionHandlingWebElement(final String methodName, Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourFunction<WebDriver,
141         SmartWebElement, Object[], Exception, Object>> exceptionHandlingMap) {
142      this.methodName = methodName;
143      this.exceptionHandlingMap = exceptionHandlingMap;
144   }
145
146
147   public Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourFunction<WebDriver, SmartWebElement, Object[], Exception,
148         Object>> getExceptionHandlingMap() {
149      return Collections.unmodifiableMap(exceptionHandlingMap);
150   }
151}
